entry.content:
Earn A Consistent Income Selling Real Estate While achieving Mastery, Autonomy & Purpose!

Dear real estate agent or frustrated employee:

I understand you may be working at a real estate brokerage, you may be a new agent who just got licensed, or you’re currently employed in a traditional corporate job.

Are you happy? If not, read on. As a current agent at a real estate brokerage, maybe you are lacking the leads and support to be successful, or are simply unsure of how to get moving on the right direction and require accountability. Or if you’re a new agent, you may be worried about income while you are getting started. You may also be confused by all of the many different brokerages that are available to you. Perhaps you’re employed in a traditional corporate job. If this is the case, maybe you want to work from home and/or grow a business of your own, so that you can earn the money you need and deserve.

The fact is, 90% of real estate agents fail (that’s the latest and greatest stat I could find) in the business. That’s a statistic that would instill fear in anyone!

Here are the biggest problems facing existing real estate agents:

  • Inconsistent income and burnout.
  • No leads and/or nothing to say when you do have a lead in front of you.
  • Required floor time zapping your own time.
  • No (or, at best, one) income stream.

Here are the biggest problems facing new real estate agents:

  • No money coming in while you’re learning the ropes.
  • No plan—you may the desire to work from home but don’t know how/where to start.
  • You joined the wrong team—meaning you’re giving more than you're getting out of the experience.
  • Getting thrown into a ‘sink or swim’ environment.

Here are the biggest problems facing folks employed by corporate America:

  • Many simply don’t make enough money.
  • Feeling as if you have nothing to call your own.
  • Working long hours for someone else.
  • Having no room to grow.

The fact is most real estate agents quit in the first two years simply because they don’t make enough money. They don’t make enough money because they have no plan. A plan will create an abundance of people to talk to about real estate interests, make sure these people (once you get them) will listen to what you have to say, and will create self-motivation and accountability. You need a plan to properly time-block your days, weeks, and years, so that you get in your dollar producing activities regularly.

When I started in real estate, I would read book after book hoping to find “the secret.” I sat at open houses every weekend, trying to will a buyer to come through the doors and choose me as their agent. At that same point, I also wore thin the patience of my family and friends with my constant reminders that “I’m a Realtor!” That was 19 years ago.

Today, things are even worse. Agents will watch YouTube videos of who knows who with the latest and greatest answers to real estate success. Some agents are tempted by one brokerage after another, all stating they have the best commission splits. Or, many agents fall for the worst route possible—they join Facebook groups where they get questionable advice from every agent on the planet who has nothing better to do than hang out on Facebook.

The bottom line is that you need a paycheck, and not just one. Without a consistent income, you will not be able to take care of your family. You’ll lie awake one stressful night after another believing that if you work harder tomorrow, something will eventually click.

My name is Kodi Riddle and I got into real estate 19 years ago. Since then, I’ve sold many, many homes—enough to put me in the top 1% of all residential real estate agents in the Phoenix Metro area, where there are over 20,000 agents total. I can relate to the pain you may be feeling, because I’ve had agents join my team who were in that same spot. They’ve explained to me what it’s like out there once you get your license. Multiple agents on my team were involved with brokerages where they didn’t close one deal in six months. But then, after they joined ours, they had multiple deals within the first two months.

The difference is that I provide a plan and a culture where team players hustle and work hard, have a positive attitude, embrace accountability and discipline, have a growth mindset, and do the right thing. In addition, you get to work from home and use the latest and greatest technology to stay connected to your team and support network.

You will get paid while you learn, and have access to:

  • A director of operations
  • A sales manager
  • A marketing coordinator
  • A listing coordinator
  • Pay-per-click, Zillow, and Realtor.com leads
  • RFC
  • Vyral Marketing’s services
  • Client Events
  • Giveaways
  • Closing Gifts
  • Direct mailers
  • Expired letters
  • Contact Management System
  • Expired, FSBO, and Geographical Leads leads
  • Speed Dialers
  • Virtual Tours and Professional Photos
  • NO CAP
  • An ISA Department
  • Listings2Leads
  • Market Snapshots
  • Social Media
  • SEO
  • Our top 1% reputation
  • Riddle Realty Library for Continued Growth
  • Scripts
  • Accountability, team support, and culture
  • Care for your business during times where you’re away
  • Systems and plans
  • Riddle Realty Compassion Project
  • Yard Marketing (including Open House Every Day, VoicePad, Coming Soon, and "We Sell in 30 Days or We SELL it for FREE")
  • Mega Open House Program
  • New business development stations
  • One-on-one coaching and training by a top 1% realtor and designated broker for Riddle Realty
  • Security and reduced risk

We also offer a number of supplies available for you to use as needed, such as flyers, brochures, business cards, and more.

Here are all the benefits you get by joining our team or brokerage:

  • A consistent and predictable income
  • A fun, enjoyable place to work
  • Financial security as a real estate agent
  • Confidence in your abilities to earn income
  • A sense of purpose and mission to help people
  • Time off. With us, you can work hard to play hard
  • A happy and fulfilling quality of life

Or, you can continue doing what you are doing and getting the same results:

  • No help from fellow professionals.
  • Frustration and confusion.
  • No plan.
  • No consistent income.

Let me share with you the success stories we have had here. An agent working for another real estate team was expeditiously working that team’s plan for her success, and yet had zero sales after seven months. Seven months after joining our team, she’s closed seven deals. That’s $2 million worth of real estate!

Another gal was working as a photographer at one of the largest real estate teams in the valley, taking pictures for other agent’s listings. Then she got her own real estate license. After that, she didn’t receive the leads or necessary direction to put her skills to use and make some real money. Under our direction and plan, she closed $3.2 million of real estate in her first full year in the business with us. Her second year, she closed 22 transactions—nearly $6.2 million of residential real estate!

I want to offer YOU a position on our team.

On the day you start with us, here’s exactly what’s going to happen: You will begin a 90-day bootcamp that will ensure your success on our team. I pay you while you are in bootcamp so you can learn the ins and outs of this business and our team risk-free. You will begin talking to real clients within your first two weeks. Additionally, you’ll have an 18-year veteran in the business helping you every step of the way.

If you follow this plan, we guarantee you will take home a minimum of $60,000 in your first year. However, there will also be nothing but yourself stopping you from surpassing a six-figure income in your first 12 months.

You can even begin your 90-day bootcamp without a real estate license and potentially qualify for a scholarship. We will pay you to get your license!

Here is a list of questions we get from people who are thinking about working with us:

  • I want to make the switch to real estate but I’m afraid. We take all the risk out of it because we pay you while you learn. In addition, you have reviews every 15 days to make sure you are on track.
  • Can I work from my home office? Absolutely, that’s where you get to work. We use the latest and greatest in technology to stay in touch.
  • I want quality time and one-on-one training from a broker in the business. You will have that many times during the week at Riddle Realty. You’ll have a huddle each morning, critical new business development training twice a week, and also weekly team meetings. All of these will take place with the designated broker of the company (A veteran in the business for 18 years and a top 1% agent valley-wide).
  • Do I get leads? Leads are in abundance here. You will receive no less than 30-40 leads every month.
  • I love helping people, but I’m not a fan of paperwork. We get that, which is why you will be paired with the best transaction coordinator in the business. They will manage this for you so you can do more of what you love: helping people buy or sell homes.
  • What are your commission splits? It’s not about what you make it’s about what you keep. We consistently keep more money in your pocket at Riddle Realty, so let me show you how we do it!



Let's Make You More Money
